title: Connie the cow: a curious butterfly
creator_credit: Josep Viciana, Cristina Brandner and Neptuno Films
brief_description: Join Connie the Cow, the very curious cow, in six colourful animated adventures. We all know that Connie loves to explore, make new friends and play. She is young and very mischievous. Every morning she wakes to explore the farm with her friends and brings about some exciting adventures. Music by Josep Roig.
creator_credit_for_label: Josep Viciana, Cristina Brandner and Neptuno Films
